CustomField.description: This field should indicate USDC in most cases, but for certain opportunities, the Partnership Objective will focus on the growth of EUROC or other stablecoins in the future
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should indicate USDC in most cases, but for certain opportunities, the Partnership Objective will focus on the growth of EUROC or other stablecoins in the future
CustomField.label: Stablecoin
